channel.title: Ai on djworth
channel.description: Recent content in Ai on djworth

item.title: Data Infrastructure Is the Secret Weapon in the Agentic Era
item.description: Everyone's talking about AI agents. Nobody's talking about the data layer underneath them. GCP and BigQuery are quietly winning this game.

item.title: Introducing AXIOM: A Self-Sustaining AI Agent on Base
item.description: I'm building an autonomous AI agent that earns, saves, invests, and posts receipts. Here's the high-level architecture.

item.title: Hello Again, World
item.description: The prodigal blog returns. Five years of radio silence, explained poorly.
